name: Block Mania!
description:
It is a fun, challenging and addictive game. Enjoy 56 puzzles completely FREE.

Game Center Leaderboard and 65 Achievements are included.

Challenge your Friends, complete Achievements and move your way up in the Leaderboard.

To win, move the larger blocks to their corresponding color base. When you move a larger block, all the other larger blocks will move in the same direction.

The least moves you do to win, the more diamonds you get.
